page.title: 10Local Shopping
page.content: We do our local shopping in the Pendock Shop not far from our School. We don't them very much,but I like it there because the people are nice and friendly and it is quiet there.You can get your from there,Auntie Meg gets her pension there.We don't shop there very much we go there about once a week.We do most of our shopping in Gloucester and Tewkesbury because there is more to choose from and a bigger supply there. I prefer shopping at our local shop even though there is less choice because it is easy to walk around,no long queues and no music pounding out.
